member.name: F:REghZy.MathsF.Matrix4.M0
member.summary: The first element in the matrix. This can be pointed to via pointers in order to use the matrix like a row-major array

member.name: P:REghZy.MathsF.Matrix4.Transposed
member.summary: Returns a matrix where the entire matrix is flipped along the diagonal

member.name: P:REghZy.MathsF.Matrix4.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets a specific element at the given index. This is row-major
member.exception: The index is below 0 or above 15

member.name: P:REghZy.MathsF.Matrix4.Item(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets an element intersecting the specific row and column indexes

member.name: M:REghZy.MathsF.Matrix4.Pointer(REghZy.MathsF.Matrix4.PtrCallback)
member.summary: A helper for accessing a pointer to the first
